name: Anxious Avoidance Is Not Fun
description:
(use arrows or WASD to move and advance text, or Z to advance text if you prefer)

decide how to deal with your anxiety monsters

let them drain your time and energy as you avoid confronting a task, or push through your anxiety and tackle the task directly

NOTE: feel free to talk to the character with the hat for various motivational speeches and random nonsense

___________________________________

p.s. this was my first Bitsy project

you can find Bitsy at https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy

public domain music used is "Sirens in Darkness" by The Cynic Project / cynicmusic.com / pixelsphere.org
